// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo -i --only-autofixed f52a7a7da1222767-vs.txt
//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 10.0.10011.16384
//
//   using 3Dmigoto v1.3.16 on Sun May 26 02:39:54 2019
//
//
//
// Input signature:
//
// Name                 Index   Mask Register SysValue  Format   Used
// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// POSITION                 0   xyz         0     NONE   float   xy
// TEXCOORD                 0   x           1     NONE   float   x
//
//
// Output signature:
//
// Name                 Index   Mask Register SysValue  Format   Used
// -------------------- ----- ------ -------- -------- ------- ------
// SV_Position              0   xyzw        0      POS   float   xyzw
// TEXCOORD                 0   xyzw        1     NONE   float   xyzw
//
vs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_input v0.xy
dcl_input v1.x
dcl_output_siv o0.xyzw, position
dcl_output o1.xyzw
dcl_temps 2
// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

mov r0.xy, v0.xyxx
mov r0.zw, l(0,0,0,1.000000)
mov o0.xyzw, r0.xyzw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo -i --only-autofixed f52a7a7da1222767-vs.txt
ne r1.w, r0.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r1.w
  add r1.w, r0.w, -r1.y
  mad r0.x, r1.w, r1.x, r0.x
endif

mov o1.xyw, r0.xyxw
mov o1.z, v1.x
ret
// Approximately 6 instruction slots used
